localised_text.tooltip_text: Set this adventure's mission icons and tooltips to be displayed on the top bar.
This adventure's mission icons are already pinned to the top bar.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: this| CanAfford == false => Loc("malakai_cannot_afford_adventure") | CanPerformRitual =>Loc("malakai_begin_adventure_tooltip") | InvalidRitualReason

state_in_progress.componentleveltooltip: Quest chain locked||Start Adventure to unlock quest chain

property.name: default_selection_condition
property.value: (list = JadeDatabaseContext.MalakaiOathsQuestChainList.Sort(SortOrder, true)) => {list | (list.Any(IsPinned) == false && list.FirstContext == this) || list.FirstContext(IsPinned) == this}

header_earned_unit_rewards.componentleveltooltip: This is a list of the rewards available for this Adventure

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: To unlock the final battle for the selected Adventure complete the required number of missions as indicated by the number of empty slots surrounding the button

max_units_long.componentleveltooltip: Number of units currently available for recruitment from this pool.||Unit pools will replenish based on the factors stated on each unit card's tooltip.

component_text.text: Granted when you start this adventure

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (num_complete = OathsMissionList.Filter(IsMissionAvailableInCurrentCampaign && MissionRecordContext.IsQuest == false).Count(MissionContext.Completed && MissionContext.IsCancelled == false)) => { GetIfElse(num_complete >= NumMissionsRequired, "complete", num_complete) }

(num_complete = OathsMissionList.Filter(IsMissionAvailableInCurrentCampaign && MissionRecordContext.IsQuest == false).Count(MissionContext.Completed && MissionContext.IsCancelled == false)) => { GetIfElse(num_complete >= NumMissionsRequired, "complete", num_complete) }

header_earned_unit_rewards.componentleveltooltip: This is reward you will get after completing the final battle for this oath's quest chain

callback_with_context.context_function_id: Do(Component("list_mission_tabs", self.Id).SelectContext(JadeDatabaseContext.MalakaiOathsQuestChainList.FirstContext(OathsMissionList.Any((x) => x.MissionContext == this))), Component("holder_mission_content", self.Id).SelectContext(JadeDatabaseContext.MalakaiOathsQuestChainList.Transform(OathsMissionList).FirstContext((x) => x.MissionContext == this)))

header_adventure_start.componentleveltooltip: The below units will get added to the Mercenary pool for you to recruit on starting the selected Adventure
